chunks.zh: 快过年了，整个活， AI 春联～
chunks.en: The New Year is coming, let's do something fun, AI couplets～

chunks.zh:
AI 定制春联，欢迎返图（👏

- [ai-sfc.yunyoujun.cn]( https://ai-sfc.yunyoujun.cn/)
- GitHub: [YunYouJun/ai-sfc]( https://github.com/YunYouJun/ai-sfc)

chunks.zh: 好好好 汉室遗精是吧
chunks.en: Good good good, Han Dynasty's legacy, right?

chunks.zh: 有点问题。1.中间的福字怎么也会变的。
chunks.en: A few issues. 1. Why does the Fu character in the middle change too?

2. The text punctuation marks are still there, the link has not been removed: https://ai-sfc.yunyoujun.cn/?couplets=%7B%22%E4%B8%8A%E8%81%94%22%3A%22%E6%98%A5%E5%88%B0%E4%BA%BA%E9%97%B4%E6%A2%85%E5%90%90%E8%89%B3%EF%BC%8C%22%2C%22%E4%B8%8B%E8%81%94%22%3A%22%E5%96%9C%E9%9A%8F%E7%87%95%E8%88%9E%E6%9F%B3%E8%88%92%E9%9D%92%E3%80%82%22%2C%22%E6%A8%AA%E6%89%B9%22%3A%22%E8%8A%B1%E5%BC%80%E5%AF%8C%E8%B4%B5%22%2C%22%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93%22%3A%22%E8%B4%A2%22%7D&prompt=%E8%B4%A2%E8%BF%90%E3%80%81%E5%89%8D%E7%A8%8B%E3%80%81%E7%88%B1%E6%83%85%E6%96%B9%E9%9D%A2%E7%9A%84 Also, the parallelism of these two lines doesn't seem quite right. It feels like “Spring arrives in the human world” and “Joy follows swallows dancing” don't quite match.
6, yeah, support support
666, great execution, rapid launch
Really good
Good idea
Your couplet is reversed.
A very good product!

chunks.zh: @YunYouJun 哦哦，看到了，开始没有点开链接。感觉要火。
chunks.en: @YunYouJun Oh, I see it, I didn't open the link at first. Feels like it's going to be popular.

chunks.zh: 好活 好活!! 太好玩了哈哈
chunks.en: Good stuff, good stuff!! Too much fun haha
@w3q29 I'm indulging you https://github.com/YunYouJun/ai-sfc/blob/main/packages/ai/src/api.ts#L31
https://imgur.com/a/T554lzX
@YunYouJun #64 Clicked and clicked 👍

chunks.zh: 除了对仗有点不工整之外，整的挺好。加油好好干，我看好你哟
chunks.en: Other than the parallelism being a bit off, it's pretty good overall. Keep up the good work, I have high hopes for you.

chunks.zh: 可以限制上下联的字数吗
chunks.en: Can the number of characters in the upper and lower couplets be limited?

chunks.zh: @Haku 福字是故意的，可以有更有趣点的总结。标点符号我再去一下。AI 就是抽卡嘛，可以再抽几次（
chunks.en: @Haku The Fu character is intentional, it can have a more interesting summary. I'll take care of the punctuation marks again. AI is like drawing cards, you can draw a few more times (

chunks.zh: @myderr 啊 还没加这个功能，昨晚临时糊的，之后做一下，有空可以提个 issue 。
chunks.en: @myderr Ah, this feature hasn't been added yet, I quickly put it together last night, I'll work on it later, you can submit an issue if you have time.

chunks.zh: 建议可以选择字体，背景图片也提供多种选择，可以生成各种风格类型的壁纸。过年期间这种需求应该挺大的
chunks.en: It is recommended to be able to choose fonts, and offer multiple options for background images, so that various styles of wallpapers can be generated. This kind of demand should be quite high during the New Year period.
@luckyM Add it after customization (
